question: You work for an international company, and would like to spend six months working in its head office in another country. Write a letter to your manager. In your letter explain why you want to work in company's head office for six months. Say how you work could be done while you are away. Ask for his/her help in arranging it.
text: Hello, I wish everything could be all right.

I am writing this letter because I heard our head office in another country need to some accounting for six months to learn new methods of ACCA. I am  an accounting of your employees, ready to go there and learn new abilities. If you remember sometimes we have some problems with the new rules of ACCA and I believe that it is the best chance to solve them. Besides, I can visit our colleagues in head office and be friends. Also, I could  teach anything which is important to our colleagues to Mr Ramtin. He is the genius co-worker that I have ever had. Moreover, if there is another problem, he can call me.
However, I send a request for our head office manager but I need your favour. Could you please call them and say about our situation?
